item.title: Video: Søren Kierkegaard's Copenhagen
item.description: Søren Kierkegaard statue at the Royal Danish Library Before my trip to Copenhagen a few weeks back, I did a bit of research to track down places of interest in respect to Søren Kierkegaard’s life. I ended up doing more research after my trip, and was able to track down even more locations, all of which I plotted on a map for convenience. That should help you out if you ever visit, and are at all interested in Kierkegaard’s life!
